article_text:
MILAN—Finmeccanica SpA has agreed to sell its power-equipment business, Ansaldo Energia, to an Italian state-run fund, in a deal valued at more than €1 billion ($1.36 billion) for Italy's biggest defense and aerospace company and its business partner.

The deal, which Finmeccanica confirmed late Friday, will help the company raise badly needed...

The deal, which Finmeccanica confirmed late Friday, will help the company raise badly needed...
MILAN—Finmeccanica SpA has agreed to sell its power-equipment business, Ansaldo Energia, to an Italian state-run fund, in a deal valued at more than €1 billion ($1.36 billion) for Italy's biggest defense and aerospace company and its business partner.
